alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 2:57PM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 50 to 60 MPH with frequent gusts to 85 MPH expected. Occasional gusts 90 to 100 MPH are possible. * WHERE...Snowy Range and adjacent foothills including Centennial, Arlington, and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...Noon MDT Monday until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be an extreme risk for vehicle blow overs! Tree damage is also possible near the Snowy Range.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
